statements: SELECT * FROM RFP_Responses WHERE submission_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT response_id, supplier_name FROM RFP_Responses WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Corp%'
SELECT supplier_name, submission_date FROM RFP_Responses WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Inc' ORDER BY submission_date DESC
SELECT * FROM RFP_Responses WHERE response_details IS NOT NULL
SELECT response_id, supplier_name, submission_date FROM RFP_Responses WHERE submission_date < '2022-03-15' ORDER BY submission_date
SELECT supplier_name, submission_date, response_details FROM RFP_Responses WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT response_details, supplier_name FROM RFP_Responses WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM RFP_Responses ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT response_id, supplier_name FROM RFP_Responses WHERE submission_date < '2021-06-30';
SELECT supplier_name, submission_date FROM RFP_Responses WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Corp'
SELECT * FROM rfp_responses;
SELECT supplier_name, submitted_date FROM rfp_responses WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT response_text FROM rfp_responses ORDER BY submitted_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(response_id) AS total_responses FROM rfp_responses GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT analysis_result, analysis_date FROM procurement_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM rfp_responses WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY submitted_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, response_text FROM rfp_responses WHERE response_id = 1001;
SELECT response_id, supplier_name, submitted_date FROM rfp_responses WHERE submitted_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT A.supplier_name, B.analysis_result FROM rfp_responses A JOIN procurement_analysis B ON A.response_id = B.response_id WHERE B.analysis_date > '2021-06-30';
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_result FROM procurement_analysis WHERE analysis_result ILIKE '%good%' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RFP_Responses ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM Supplier_Information WHERE supplier_rating > 4.5;
SELECT proposal_text FROM RFP_Responses WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT supplier_name, response_date FROM RFP_Responses WHERE response_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_result FROM Proposal_Analysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM RFP_Responses WHERE response_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, response_date FROM RFP_Responses WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT * FROM Supplier_Information WHERE supplier_rating > 4.0 ORDER BY supplier_rating DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM Supplier_Information WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT analysis_id, response_id, supplier_id, analysis_date FROM Proposal_Analysis WHERE analysis_result = 'Approved' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RFP_Responses;
SELECT supplier_name, response_date FROM RFP_Responses ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT response_id, supplier_name, response_date FROM RFP_Responses WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM Supplier_Information WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT review_id, reviewer_name, review_date FROM Proposal_Review WHERE approval_status = true;
SELECT response_id, supplier_name, response_date FROM RFP_Responses ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM Supplier_Information WHERE supplier_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT review_id, reviewer_name, approval_status FROM Proposal_Review WHERE approval_status = TRUE ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Procurement_Statistics WHERE overall_rating > 4 AND comments LIKE '%excellent%' ORDER BY overall_rating DESC, supplier_name ASC;

SELECT response_id, supplier_name, response_details FROM RFP_Responses JOIN Procurement_Statistics ON RFP_Responses.response_id = Procurement_Statistics.response_id WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, address FROM Suppliers;
SELECT rfp_name, deadline, budget FROM RFPs ORDER BY deadline DESC;

SELECT r.supplier_id, s.supplier_name, r.average_score FROM Evaluation e JOIN RFP_Responses r ON e.response_id = r.response_id JOIN Suppliers s ON r.supplier_id = s.supplier_id JOIN Analysis a ON e.evaluation_id = a.evaluation_id;
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM RFP_Responses WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT rfp_name, deadline FROM RFPs;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT rfp_name, deadline FROM RFPs WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM RFP_Responses WHERE supplier_id = 2 ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT evaluation_id, score, comments FROM Evaluation WHERE score BETWEEN 80 AND 100 ORDER BY evaluation_id ASC;
